# Snapshot 25w42a
-# https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w42a
## Changes
- Underwater biome fog color and fog distance is now blended based on the player's position between biomes, similarly to regular biome fog and sky colors
- Updated the "Oh Shiny" advancement to include the Golden Spear and Golden Nautilus Armor
- Zombie Horses can be leashed when its mob jockey is removed
- The Nautilus and Zombie Nautilus can now be controlled while on land
- Mending is no longer incompatible with the Lunge enchantment
## Technical Changes
- <:pack_icon:984997615160684594> The Data Pack version is now 90.0
- <:pack_icon:984997615160684594> The Resource Pack version is now 70.1
### Minecraft Server Management Protocol Version 1.1.0
- Enable authentication from web browsers
- Authenticate by passing the token in Sec-WebSocket-Protocol header when opening the WebSocket connection
- Example: Sec-WebSocket-Protocol: minecraft-v1,
- Requests authenticating this way are subject to Origin header checks. This requires configuration of allowed origins on the server side using management-server-allowed-origins. The default value is empty, meaning Sec-Websocket-Protocol authentication is effectively disabled
## Data Pack Version 90.0
- <:bao_icon_worldgen:937567566656843836> Certain visual and gameplay effects can now be controlled by Environment Attributes
### Commands
- Resource suggestions now show results in any namespace instead of just within minecraft
### Changed stopwatch
- Switched the order of the id argument
- Example: /stopwatch foo:bar create is now /stopwatch create foo:bar
- query now returns the queried value and takes in a new scale argument
- The returned value will be scaled by that argument and truncated
- The scale is optional and will default to 1 if omitted
- Example: /stopwatch query foo:bar 20 to get the elapsed time in ticks
### Environment Attributes
Environment Attributes provide a data-driven way to control a variety of visual and gameplay systems.

Each Environment Attribute controls a specific visual or gameplay effect: for example, minecraft:visual/sky_color controls the color of the sky, and minecraft:gameplay/water_evaporates controls whether water can be placed at a given location.

> __**Developer‚Äôs Note**__: This system and many of the introduced attributes should be considered very experimental, and may still change significantly in coming snapshots and releases. In the meantime, we would as always love to hear any feedback or suggestions you may have!
## Resource Pack Version 70.1
### Sounds
- Added new sound events for the Nautilus:
- entity.nautilus.riding
## Bugs Fixed
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> World types in Realms backup info screen are untranslatable
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Text components in the "label" of input controls in dialogs don't support "hover_event"
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Labels for booleans within dialogs are rendered in a slightly different shade of white than normal
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Object text components do not render in some places unless there are text glyphs on the same line
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> The mouse cursor doesn‚Äôt change to the hand shape when hovering over checkboxes

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1427663354993971371
https://discord.gg/minecraftfeedback

items.content_text:
# Snapshot 25w43a
-# https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w43a
## New Features
### Spear Weapon
- Spears now deal more damage through charge attacks dealt by players, but also mobs
- The Spear model is now slighly larger
- Spears provide visual feedback when they hit a target in the charge attack
### Lunge Enchantment
- Using Lunge no longer causes durability damage to the Spear
- Using Lunge now consumes hunger points by exhausting the player, similar to sprinting or jumping
- Level 1 Lunge consumes 3 hunger points, level 2 consumes 4 hunger points, and level 3 consumes 5 hunger points
- Lunge can only be used if the player has at least 6 hunger points in their hunger bar
## Changes
- The Nautilus and Zombie Nautilus can no longer be placed in boats
## Technical Changes
- <:pack_icon:984997615160684594> The Data Pack version is now 91.0
- <:pack_icon:984997615160684594> The Resource Pack version is now 71.0
### Data Pack Version 91.0
- World Border interpolation is now dependent on game ticks instead of real time
- This means the World Border will no longer move when the game is paused
- It will also respect any changes made by the `/tick` command
- Changed loot function `filtered` to allow running modification when predicate fails
- Added `discard` loot function
## Bugs Fixed
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> The world border can change in size when the game is paused
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Banners sometimes show incorrect textures when viewed from some angles
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Some item frames do not render their item correctly after world upgrade
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Held and dropped items sometimes fail to render correctly when banners exist in the world
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Can use the game mode switcher while the game is paused, and doing so unpauses the game

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1430199042633240717

# Bedrock 1.21.120

https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft--bedrock-edition-1-21-120

**Please note: **This update will roll out to various platforms as they become available throughout the day. It may take up to 24 hours to appear for everyone - thank you for your patience. Also, please note that Vibrant Visuals enhanced Marketplace content can only be downloaded after updating to the 1.21.120 version on Bedrock. We apologize for the inconvenience!

## Features and Bug Fixes
**Blocks**
- <:tadpole:983783497581883473> Tadpoles now spawn in the water block below the Frogspawn block
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Weathered Copper Bars no longer have pixels that look out of place
- <:dirt:324967464532312064> Tilling Coarse Dirt no longer sometimes tills the block twice converting it directly to Farmland
- <:torch:1305906954270539847> Copper Lantern and Copper Torch have new textures to make them easier to distinguish from regular Lantern and Torch
- Soul Fire Lantern textures are now animated

**Shelf**
- <:redstone:1135755699377414255> Adding or removing Redstone power to or from the Shelf now emits vibrations
- üß± Anvil and Wall Blocks have been repositioned on the Shelf and Item Frame
- <:redstone:1135755699377414255> When a Player places/removes/swaps an item on an Unpowered Shelf, a vibration of frequency 3 is emitted

**Commands**
- <:endcrystal:1421239277555290288> Fixed an issue where the Damage command would incorrectly report failure when applying damage to an Ender Crystal
- <:biome:634859552973651979> Fixed /locate biome command to no longer direct the player into wrong biome areas

**Gameplay**
- <:sign:624544613440684042> Fixed loading of text for Sign blocks from very old worlds
- üõ°Ô∏è Fixed the Shield taking damage when mining with it

**General**
- <:download:1221859913316434031> Starting a world with a missing Marketplace template will now correctly redownload the template and start the world
- üîç Marketplace content can now be searched for using Graphics filters for RTX and Vibrant Visuals

**Graphical**
- <:java:598000584691417098> Restored Java parity on how ambient occlusion is computed for partial blocks
- ‚ùÑÔ∏è Fixed snowflakes flickering during player movement
- ü´è Fixed the top of the Donkey's ear being the wrong color

**Items**
- <:6026_MCmushroomstew:627670041508184068> Suspicious Stew is now present in Creative Mode with effect description
- <:copper_golem:1405459520733315082> Copper Golem Statue now glows when placed in a Glow Item Frame
- üõ°Ô∏è Shields, Decorated Pots, and Maps now glow when placed in a Glow Item Frame

**Mobs**
- <:Chicken_Jockey1:1360329568904417386> Chicken Jockeys now drop the Lava Chicken music disc when killed by the player or tamed Wolves
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Wither Skeletons can now pick up Copper Swords
- <:drowned:631748221496066087> Drowned can now spawn with enchanted Tridents

**PlayStation 4**
- <:PlayStation:1139334198671450115> Shifted download storage to new location. Players may need to redownload Marketplace content

**Sounds**
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Copper Chest Opening and Close sounds now use a natural attenuation curve
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Copper Golem Step and Spin sounds now use a natural attenuation curve

**Stability and Performance**
- Improved stability around Hopper Block destruction

**User Interface**
- üñ±Ô∏è Clicking on text fields now places the cursor in the correct spot even for scrolled message boxes
- <:stev:888548080922804334> The paper doll on the inventory screen should now look at the cursor

**World Generation**

items.content_text:
# Bedrock 1.21.120

https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft--bedrock-edition-1-21-120

**Please note: **This update will roll out to various platforms as they become available throughout the day. It may take up to 24 hours to appear for everyone - thank you for your patience. Also, please note that Vibrant Visuals enhanced Marketplace content can only be downloaded after updating to the 1.21.120 version on Bedrock. We apologize for the inconvenience!

## Features and Bug Fixes
**Blocks**
- <:tadpole:983783497581883473> Tadpoles now spawn in the water block below the Frogspawn block
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Weathered Copper Bars no longer have pixels that look out of place
- <:dirt:324967464532312064> Tilling Coarse Dirt no longer sometimes tills the block twice converting it directly to Farmland
- <:torch:1305906954270539847> Copper Lantern and Copper Torch have new textures to make them easier to distinguish from regular Lantern and Torch
- Soul Fire Lantern textures are now animated

**Shelf**
- <:redstone:1135755699377414255> Adding or removing Redstone power to or from the Shelf now emits vibrations
- üß± Anvil and Wall Blocks have been repositioned on the Shelf and Item Frame
- <:redstone:1135755699377414255> When a Player places/removes/swaps an item on an Unpowered Shelf, a vibration of frequency 3 is emitted

**Commands**
- <:endcrystal:1421239277555290288> Fixed an issue where the Damage command would incorrectly report failure when applying damage to an Ender Crystal
- <:biome:634859552973651979> Fixed /locate biome command to no longer direct the player into wrong biome areas

**Gameplay**
- <:sign:624544613440684042> Fixed loading of text for Sign blocks from very old worlds
- üõ°Ô∏è Fixed the Shield taking damage when mining with it

**General**
- <:download:1221859913316434031> Starting a world with a missing Marketplace template will now correctly redownload the template and start the world
- üîç Marketplace content can now be searched for using Graphics filters for RTX and Vibrant Visuals

**Graphical**
- <:java:598000584691417098> Restored Java parity on how ambient occlusion is computed for partial blocks
- ‚ùÑÔ∏è Fixed snowflakes flickering during player movement
- ü´è Fixed the top of the Donkey's ear being the wrong color

**Items**
- <:6026_MCmushroomstew:627670041508184068> Suspicious Stew is now present in Creative Mode with effect description
- <:copper_golem:1405459520733315082> Copper Golem Statue now glows when placed in a Glow Item Frame
- üõ°Ô∏è Shields, Decorated Pots, and Maps now glow when placed in a Glow Item Frame

**Mobs**
- <:Chicken_Jockey1:1360329568904417386> Chicken Jockeys now drop the Lava Chicken music disc when killed by the player or tamed Wolves
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Wither Skeletons can now pick up Copper Swords
- <:drowned:631748221496066087> Drowned can now spawn with enchanted Tridents

**PlayStation 4**
- <:PlayStation:1139334198671450115> Shifted download storage to new location. Players may need to redownload Marketplace content

**Sounds**
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Copper Chest Opening and Close sounds now use a natural attenuation curve
- <:copper:852294351496544296> Copper Golem Step and Spin sounds now use a natural attenuation curve

**Stability and Performance**
- Improved stability around Hopper Block destruction

**User Interface**
- üñ±Ô∏è Clicking on text fields now places the cursor in the correct spot even for scrolled message boxes
- <:stev:888548080922804334> The paper doll on the inventory screen should now look at the cursor

**World Generation**
- üå≤ Structures no longer build on top of features (e.g. trees) at chunk borders

...And many more!
items.title: Bedrock 1.21.120

items.content_text:
# Snapshot 25w44a
-# https://www.minecraft.net/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w44a
## New Features
- Updated advancements to include the Camel Husk, and the Parched
- Added a new graphical option "Anisotropic Filtering"
- Parched, New Skeleton variant
- Camel Husk, New undead Camel variant
## Changes
- Parrots now can mimic the sounds of Zombie Nautilus, Zombie Horse, Camel Husk and Parched
- Nautiluses and Zombie Nautiluses can now attack any mob if provoked by that mob, not just players
- Environmental Fog in the Nether is no longer dependent on the render distance setting, and will consistently be applied from 10 to 96 blocks
- Horses, Mules, Donkeys, and Camels no longer sink in water while ridden by a player
- Chunks now fade in instead of appearing out of nowhere, with the fade-in time adjustable through Video Settings
- Bats no longer spawn more frequently and in higher light levels between October 20 and November 3
- UI
- "Interface" inside the Video Settings screen has been renamed to "Preferences"
- The Single Biome Customization screen now has a search box
- The language selection screen now has a search box to filter languages
## Technical Changes
- The Data Pack version is now 92.0
- The Resource Pack version is now 72.0
- The Minecraft Server Management Protocol version is now 2.0.0
- Added support for KQueue on OSX to improve network connection performance
## Resource Pack Version 72.0
- ``block.vsh/fsh`` copies ``terrain.vsh/fsh`` and handles ad-hoc blocks (e.g. held by entities)
- Added ``ChunkSection`` uniform, used by ``terrain.vsh`` (which replaces ``DynamicTransforms``)
- New shaders have been introduced to perform GPU based sprite animations
- ``Globals`` uniform now has camera coordinates
## Fixed bugs in 25w44a
- The player model in the inventory screen renders in the wrong orientation when it's not standing up straight
- Gaps between the faces of item models and complex block models
- Some particles have very thin, vertical lines that flash in and out around the particles
- Magma blocks can generate on the ceilings of caves below aquifers
- Character body moves instead of the head when riding a happy ghast

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: ‚Å†https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1432747105973174313
https://discord.gg/minecraftfeedback
items.title: Snapshot 25w44a

items.content_text:
### Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.24
-# https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40708241210765-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-24
## Features and Bug Fixes
# Mounts of Mayhem
- Mount improvements
- Horses, Zombie Horses, Donkeys, Mules, and Camels no longer sink when ridden by players while swimming
# Nautilus
- Tamed Nautilus now has the correct death message when dying on land
- Nautilus no longer produce water splashing sounds when they are pushed on dry land
- Nautilus now produce hurt and death sounds when out of water
- Nautilus charge attack cooldown is now 4 seconds
- Nautilus charge attack now deals 3 damage
- Nautilus now prioritizes breeding over tempting when offered food
- Increased Nautilus dash speed from 10 blocks/second to 14 blocks/second
# Spear
- The wielder's base attack damage now contributes to damage dealt by Spears
- The Spears item group in the Creative Inventory is now labeled as "Spears" instead of "Spear"
- Updated the Netherite Spear item icon to better match the colors of its in-game model
- Renamed the ``minecraft:spear`` item tag to ``minecraft:is_spear``, matching similar tool tags
- Slightly increased the post-attack cooldown of some Spears, to align with Java Edition and balance the now more accessible Lunge Enchantment
- Tweaked the reflectiveness of Spears when Vibrant Visuals is enabled
# Zombie Horse
- Fix missing hint text for dismounting the Zombie Horse
- Fixed a bug where Zombie Horses would not spawn in Ice Plains
- Fixed a bug where the Zombie Horse feeding sound effect would not obey the Friendly Mob Audio setting
- Zombie Horse now uses Horse feeding sound effect
- Zombie Horses now avoid areas with sunlight
- Zombie Horses now flee sunlight instead of running around wildly in a panic
# Zombie Nautilus
- Tamed Zombie Nautilus now has the correct death message when dying on land
- Zombie Nautilus no longer produce water splashing sounds when they are pushed on dry land
- Zombie Nautilus now produce hurt and death sounds when out of water
- Zombie Nautilus charge attack cooldown is now 4 seconds
- Increased Nautilus dash speed from 10 blocks/second to 14 blocks/second
- Zombie Nautilus now produce eating sounds when they are fed
- Zombie Nautilus audio category is now set to neutral
- Zombie Nautilus will now attack nearby Pufferfish
- Zombie Nautilus will now attack if provoked
- Zombie Nautilus charge attack now deals 3 damage
- An armored Zombie Nautilus will no longer burn in sunlight
# Blocks
- Custom blocks will no longer be overly bright when flying between two inventory slots
# Gameplay
- Fixed bug preventing players from growing Pink Petals, Wildflowers, or Leaf Litter by targeting side of a block
# General
- Reenabled missing music for several biomes

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1433137357485248612
https://discord.gg/minecraftfeedback
items.title: Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.24

-# https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40774360073997-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-25-Windows-Hotfix
A new update has been released for Windows to address an issue with the 1.21.130 Preview.
## Fixes
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed several bugs related to IME (Input Method Editor), which helps players type in languages that use complex characters, such as Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and others

items.content_text:
# Snapshot 25w45a
-# https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w45a
Greetings from the Tuesday snapshot shipping room! Our final set of features for Mounts of Mayhem brings the game's strongest armor tier to your favorite mount ‚Äì with Netherite horse armor! As well as making your steed more stylish, Netherite horse armor will also make them sturdier, perfect for all those mounted challenges. On the submerged side of things, explorers of warmer waters can now swim-ble upon a rare variant of the zombie nautilus..
## New Features
- üñºÔ∏è Updated the panorama for the Mounts of Mayhem drop
- üê¥ Added Netherite Horse Armor that can be obtained by upgrading Diamond Horse Armor with a Smithing Table
### Spear Weapon
- Spears are now less forgiving if you miss a charge attack
### Coral Zombie Nautilus
- Added a new variant of the Zombie Nautilus mob: the Coral Zombie Nautilus
- It Spawns in Warm Oceans, replacing the normal Zombie Nautilus
### Camel Husk
- Drops 2-3 Rotten Flesh when killed, with extra 0-1 for each level of Looting
### Advancements
- Added the "Mob Kabob" advancement for spearing 5 enemies with a Charge attack
## Changes
- Zombie Horses, Camel Husks and Nautili become persistent with any interaction from a player, not just riding them
- Video memory impact of anisotropic filtering was reduced, but still remains quite high
- The color of the sky during sunrises and sunsets is now affected by rain and thunder
## Technical Changes
- The Data Pack version is now 93.0
- The Resource Pack version is now 73.0
## Bugs Fixed
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Certain entity animations stop after they've existed in world for too long
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> View Bobbing stops working after long elytra flight
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Jump bar progress renders unused pixels from dynamic texture atlas
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Armadillo scute drops are not affected by the mob_drops game rule
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Mace smash attack can push players in creative mode that are flying

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1435283881342537840
https://discord.gg/minecraftfeedback
items.title: Snapshot 25w45a

items.content_text:
# Bedrock 1.21.121
-# https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40877613133709-Minecraft-1-21-121-Bedrock
A new update has been released to address issues discovered in the 1.21.120 release. This update will be rolling out to the various platforms as they become available, so please allow time for the update to reach you.
## Fixes
### Input
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed a bug on Windows where resuming the game with the Task Manager opened caused the cursor to stutter at the center of the screen
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed a bug on Windows where the camera snapped to a random direction after closing the GUI and clicking any mouse button
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Restored support for input from IME on Windows
### Stability and Performance
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed a crash from using a data-driven renderer
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed a crash on PlayStation 5 caused by excessive memory use when stacking large add-ons
### User Interface
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Fixed a bug where resource pack settings would not apply in-game when changed

# Snapshot 25w46a
-# https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w46a
## Changes
### Mobs
- Parched are now immune to Weakness effect
- Horses, Mules, Donkeys, Camels, Zombie Horses and Camel Husks will not panic if controlled by Mobs
- Nautiluses and Zombie Nautiluses now play a dash sound when they perform their dash attack
### Items
- Spears no longer cause item interact vibrations
- Spawn Eggs are now sorted thematically in the Creative Inventory, according to the following categories:
- Overworld
- Farm Animals
- Mounts
- Pets
- Wild Animals
- Aquatic
- Miscellaneous
- Golems
- Villagers
- Undead
- Spiders
- Monsters
- Illagers
- Nether
- The End
### UI
- Added an inventory UI for the Nautilus and Zombie Nautilus
- Renamed the "Show Music Toast" option to "Music Toast"
- Added a third state to the "Music Toast" option, allowing it to only be shown in the pause menu
- Added splash text "One does not simply walk to the Far Lands"
> Developer‚Äôs Note: This statement was proven false on October 4, 2025
## Technical Changes
- The Data Pack version is now 93.1
- The Resource Pack version is now 74.0
## Bugs Fixed
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Recipes for new waxed copper blocks are not grouped
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Zombified piglins spawned from lightning striking a pig do not have a chance to hold a golden spear
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> The charging animations of some items are incorrect
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> Buckets of fish heal nautiluses much less than fish items
- <:PiggoBug:710091809975435295> You can perform spear jabbing and charging attacks simultaneously

...And many more!
Join the official feedback discord server and discuss these changes here: https://discord.com/channels/1138536747932864532/1437822286433615893
https://discord.gg/minecraftfeedback
